Tool

NamePolygon Self-Intersection
ID12
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2012

Description

Self-intersection of one layer's polygons. Uses the free and open source software library Clipper created by Angus Johnson. Clipper Homepage Clipper at SourceForge

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Polygons Shapes (input)POLYGONS
Output
Intersection (*)Shapes (optional output)INTERSECT
Options
IdentifierTable fieldID
(*) optional
